Come and catch up with all your Challenge friends whilst having a fantastic, fun and free evening.

WHERE: The Signing Tree Conference Centre, Ladywood Road, Birmingham, B16 8SZ (It's behind Broadway Plaza which has bowling and cinema)
WHO: Hosted by the Youth Board and open to everybody between 14-18â€“ bring friends and get your team from The Challenge to sign up!
WHY:It is a great opportunity to experience other cultures and be part of a diverse community. Discover new cultures, new foods and new faces. Meet up with all your friends from The Challenge...
Click Attending on Facebook to let us know that you are coming.
